HACKERCAFE

A coworking space

Learn more

Hello Everyone

We are building brand new Hackercafe. Where you are surrounded with think-a-likes, hackers, nerds, designers and coders. All with their own skills and expertise, but united by their love for programming. The Hackercafe will provide an awesome workplace to meet, discuss, work, game, code and learn. Imagine the possibilities when great hackers come together and work at their own (company) projects, contribute to open source, share knowledge, brainstorm, for fun, work or just to make the world a little better! Alone or together, whatever suits you. The place where young talent meets seniors.

We are opening in

Utrecht

* Other cities coming soon
